meanings.def: to reduce something, especially something bad, to the lowest possible level
examples: Good hygiene helps to minimize the risk of infection.
Costs were minimized by using plastic instead of leather.
The proposals are designed to minimize waste and encourage recycling.
measures to help minimize the effects of the recession
to pay the cheapest possible rent in order to minimize costs
They worked at night in order to minimize the disruption.

meanings.def: to try to make something seem less important than it really is
examples: He always tried to minimize his own faults, while exaggerating those of others.

meanings.def: to make something small, especially on a computer screen
examples: Minimize any windows you have open.
